futo-org/fcast

Protocol for wireless streaming between devices

View on index

Related repos

  • SDK for Airplay, Miracast, and GoogleCast protocols
  • multi-protocol media server for streaming, proxying, and recording
  • software defined radio frontend for signal analysis and hardware control
  • Open source software defined radio platform
  • Transfers files across devices over local networks
  • Streaming server for sub-second latency over WebRTC and LLHLS
  • Transmits network packets over radio via USB CDC ECM ethernet adapter
  • Jellyfin media server client for iOS and tvOS
